summary: The film centres on Mike, a businessman in decidedly the new Russian mould. When Mike gets stung on a deal, his suspicions immediately fall on Lev, who receives the customary torture to make him reveal where the money has gone.
cast: Ingeborga Dapkunaite|Tatyana Drubich|Natalya Kolyakanova|Aleksandr Baluev|Viktor Gvozditsky|Stanislav Pavlov|Nikolay Chindyaykin|Igor Zolotovitskiy|Yuriy Stepanov|Mamuka Kikaleishvili|Aleksandra Islentyeva|Sergey Chonishvili|Olesya Potashinskaya|Viktoriya Ayzentir|Olga Dzusova|Valeriy Ivakov|Aleksandr Karamnov|Aleksandr Kuzmichyov|Yuri Madyanov|Dmitriy Orlov|Albert Razilov|Dmitri Sivozhelezov|Mikhail Tserishenko|Anatoliy Belyy
keywords: place name in title|one word title|money
title: Moskva
